doc.title: Yo-Yo Ma at Tanglewood
doc.plot: Two hour programs co-produced with the BBC, Arts & Entertainment Network, and ICM Artists Video. Executive Producers Lee Lamont, Peter Rosen. Yo-Yo Ma, Emanual Ax, Leon Fleisher, Roger Norrington, Bobby McFerrin, Isaac Stern, Jian Wang, John Williams, and many others perform and discuss their lives in a lively presentation from Tanglewood.
